required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Drug-drug Interaction Study of SHR2150 on Healthy Chinese Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-centre, Single-arm, Open-label and Fixed-sequence Drug-drug Interaction Study to Evaluate the Effect of Efavirenz on the Pharmacokinetics of SHR2150 in Healthy Chinese Subjects

brief_summary.textblock:
The study is a single-centre, open-label, fixed-sequence, self-controlled clinical trial. It is planned to enroll 20 healthy adult subjects.
Subjects will take SHR2150 on Day 1 and Day 21, and take efavirenz from Day 7 to Day 26.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: The study is a single-centre, single-arm, open-label and fixed-sequence clinical trial.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from Day 1 to Day 7 after the first dose and from Day 21 to Day 27 after the second dose
primary_outcome.description: Time to maximum observed serum concentration (Tmax) for SHR2150 after Single dose

primary_outcome.time_frame: from Day 1 to Day 7 after the first dose and from Day 21 to Day 27 after the second dose
primary_outcome.description: Maximum observed serum concentration (Cmax) for SHR2150 after Single dose

primary_outcome.time_frame: from Day 1 to Day 7 after the first dose and from Day 21 to Day 27 after the second dose
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC0-t) for SHR2150 after Single dose

primary_outcome.time_frame: from Day 1 to Day 7 after the first dose and from Day 21 to Day 27 after the second dose
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration versus time curve (AUC0-inf ) for SHR2150 after Single dose

primary_outcome.time_frame: from Day 1 to Day 7 after the first dose and from Day 21 to Day 27 after the second dose
primary_outcome.description: Time to elimination half-life (T1/2) for for SHR2150 after Single dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with adverse events and the severity of adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from Day 1 to Day 37 after the first dose

intervention.description: SHR2150 tablet single dose, Efavirenz single dose.
